title.title: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND TANAH LOT TOUR
title.text: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND TANAH LOT TOUR
title.html: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND TANAH LOT TOUR

tagline.title: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO FEEL THE ENJOYMENT RIDE AN ELEPHANT AT BAKAS VILLAGE AND CONTINUE VISITING TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.text: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO FEEL THE ENJOYMENT RIDE AN ELEPHANT AT BAKAS VILLAGE AND CONTINUE VISITING TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.html: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO FEEL THE ENJOYMENT RIDE AN ELEPHANT AT BAKAS VILLAGE AND CONTINUE VISITING TANAH LOT TEMPLE

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour is a Bali Combination Tour Packages by give you the Enjoyment ride an Elephant at Bakas village and continue visiting the famous Tanah Lot Temple. This opportunity offer you two different experiences during your holidays, Is chance Riding the biggest mamals in Bali islands and continue visiting Tanah Lot Temple and other tourist destination during the trip. Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour first visit is Bakas Village at Klungkung Regency by give you chance Riding an elephant through the bushes, jungle and passed the Balinese village for 30 minutes, after ride the elephant for 30 minutes you will enjoy lunch at Elephant park at Bakas village, Then the tours continue visiting Taman Ayun Temple in mengwi regency, this temple is one of famous temple and as Unesco world heritage list, we will go look around the beauty of the temple, Then visiting Alas Kedaton Temple is monkey forest in Tabanan, the temple located in middle of forest with hundred of group monkey dwell here, you will see the beauty of the temple and the funny monkey. Then visiting the last site during Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour is Tanah Lot Temple, this temple located in Tabanan village and the uniquess of Tanah Lot Temple is located right on the beach on small rock with Holy snake on the cave and Holy Water beneath the temple. Our professional Bali Tour Driver will offer you the excellent services during the trip. Below is explaination of the tourist destination will be visit during Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour.

title.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride Tour give you opportunity to ride an elephant by take program Short Ride (30 Minutes Elephant Ride) at Bakas Village at Klungkung Regency. You will go along green bushes and side of river. During the Elephant Trip you will also see beautiful green hill and sometimes appearance of monkey's. the ride that last only 30 minutes of Bali Elephant Ride Tour program. This rare experience you will have during your holiday in Bali islands by Riding the biggest animals and see the amazing view from the top of the elpehant. No doubt this great chance to feel ride on teak chair in the biggest mamals and guide by professional elephant handlers.

title.title: Taman Ayun Temple | Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour | Taman Ayun Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Taman Ayun Temple located in Mengwi District and about 55 minutes from Tanah Lot Temple. This temple is designed with Bali architecture with beautiful designed and amazing park, this temple has three section firs section you will see a beautiful aprk, secons section you will see Balinese wooden bell or known as a Bale Kul Kul and three section is the main temple, we only can see the main temple from outside. Taman Ayun Temple is built on the flat land with big fish pond surround it and it is looked like adrift on the water.

title.title: Alas Kedaton Temple | Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour | Alas Kedaton Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Alas Kedaton Temple is Balinese hindu temple located around 45 minutes from Tanah Lot Temple, is amazing temple located in the middle of the forest and the temple dwell by some group monkey jumping around and make funny attitude, beside the monkey also you can see other attraction such as see bats flying around the forest hanging up on the tree and also they have big python snake just for attraction for the guest want to take picture, Also kedaton temple also most visited by tourist for see monkey forest at Tabanan village.
description.html: Alas Kedaton Temple is Balinese hindu temple located around 45 minutes from Tanah Lot Temple, is amazing temple located in the middle of the forest and the temple dwell by some group monkey jumping around and make funny attitude, beside the monkey also you can see other attraction such as see bats flying around the forest hanging up on the tree and also they have big python snake just for attraction for the guest want to take picture, Also kedaton temple also most visited by tourist for see monkey forest at Tabanan village.

button.title: Alas Kedaton Temple | Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour

title.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour | Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tanah Lot Temple also one of the important temple for Balinese people located in Tabanan, Braban Village. This temple is most visited by tourist for enjoy the view of the beach and the temple. Beside see the temple, also you can see the Holy snake right on the cave located opposite with Tanah Lot Temple, the holy snake is like a sea snake with color black and white, local people believed if this snake guarding the temple from bad spirit. Then also you can visit the Holy Water located beneath of Tanah Lot Temple, if the water not so high you can ask permission to the priest to have and drink the holy water.

price.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,450,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,150,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,075,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 1,000,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 975,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour Include :

  • Private Car with Good A/C
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • 30 minutes Elephant Ride
  • Entrance Ticket
  • Indonesian Lunch
  • Mineral Water

itinerary.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Tanah Lot Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Visit Bakas Village for do Elephant Ride Adventure
Visit Taman Ayun Temple
Visit Alas Kedaton Temple
Visit Tanah Lot Temple

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
